text: It's only a small garden on top of a huge mall, not much to see although it's well kept. You'll get an ok view of the city. I recommend taking the elevator since there's so many floors.
Not at all what the pictures look like. Possibly run down and not looked after during covid. The view isn’t really that good either.
A small but cosy garden on the rooftop of Orchard Central. It has a beautiful panaromic view of the surrounding area including some parts of the Istana gardens.
